description.narrative: Output 5.3: Strengthened political commitment, accountability and national capacity for evidence-based legislation, planning and budgeting for scaling-up quality and inclusive education.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.
Other activities for equitable access to quality education e.g. school feeding, school grants
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

title.narrative: Zimbabwe United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Zimbabwe: Summative Evaluation of UNICEF support for Education in Zimbabwe
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 5.3: Strengthened political commitment, accountability and national capacity for evidence-based legislation, planning and budgeting for scaling-up quality and inclusive education.

description.narrative: Significant progress made in development of key policy and legislative frameworks in education, Early Learning and Inclusive Education Policies to be finalized for submission to Cabinet. The national education system is implementing minimum package of interventions to provide inclusiveness and equity and promote learning outcomes including early learning and 75.71% of schools meet child-friendly country-specific standards. 2019 School census data was availed within the year, followed by development of 12 district profiles to improve use of evidence in decision-making. UNICEF also supported satellite schools to meet school standards by providing financial support to address the schools' priority needs. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of appropriate law/policy explicitly mentioning the rights of children with disabilities to receive an education - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a well-functioning examinations system - score (1-4), see guidance
Early learning policy and early learning programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards score 1-4, see guidance (AMP Indicator, standard output indicator c2a)
# / % of schools meeting child-friendly CFS / country-specific standards
EMIS data for the year available for use in the same year, including data on children with disabilities

baseline.value: EMIS data for year available in same year, incl. data on CWDs

target.value: 2020:EMIS data for year available in same year, incl. data on CWDs

title.narrative: Core elements of Education Sector Strategic Plan (ESSP) implemented with UNICEF staff
The national education system is implementing a minimum package of interventions to promote inclusiveness and equity
Education systems are implementing a minimum package of interventions to promote learning outcomes including early learning [Compact 306]
